titleInfo.title: B'nai B'rith I. Rude Community Building

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Stamped on back of photograph: ''Albert O. Corwin, Commercial Photographer, Business Phone Alpine 2195, Residence Phone Alpine 8338, 19 East Eleventh Ave., Denver 3, Colorado.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#412, B'nai B'rith Bldg, Colfax and Williams, 1475 Williams, formerly Progress Club, Mag-B'nai B'rith June 25 pp 16-17.''

mods.abstract: Exterior view of the B'nai B'rith - I. Rude Community Building, a four story brick building located 1475 Williams St (East Colfax and Williams).
